t: What Happened To Morninghead After Shark Tank? - The List
s: July 3, 2023 - But after the episode aired, Morninghead has kept a low profile. Its social media pages, including Instagram and Twitter, have not been updated since 2014. However, its website is still up and running. That said, the only way to get your hands on this hair product is by purchasing it on Amazon.
